titles.title: Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007
Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007
Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007
Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007
A bill to temporarily extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Hinojosa moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1868.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 7/31/2007--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Second Higher Education Extension Act of 2007 - Amends the Higher Education Extension Act of 2005 to extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965 through October 31, 2007.
